signals.problem_statement: The customer finds that Google Groups does not work effectively for managing shared inboxes.
signals.customer_ask: Interested in using Hiver for a shared inbox.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is unsure how to view a specific group inbox instead of their entire mailbox.
signals.customer_ask: Wants to know how to set up and view a group inbox.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is concerned about the lack of historical email import functionality without additional charges.
signals.customer_ask: Inquires about importing past emails into the group.

signals.problem_statement: The customer finds it annoying to set up new user accounts with delegated access.
signals.customer_ask: Looking for a more efficient way to manage user access.
